price: 79. (Ibliis) wuxuu yidhi: Rabbiyow! Ii sug ilaa Maalinta la soo bixinayo (Qiyaamaha).
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi fa-anẓir'nī ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
